derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: via late Latin from Greek daimonikos, from daimōn (see demon)

entry.tran: 魔鬼（似）的;恶魔（般）的;邪恶的
entry.def: Demonic means coming from or belonging to a demon or being like a demon.

entry.tran: (精力、决心、能力等)超乎常人的
entry.def: If someone has demonic energy, drive, or abilities, they are more energetic, determined, or clever than most people.

example.tran: 想要成功的决心超乎常人
